Following the announcement of Steam for [[Mac OS X]], Linux benchmark and news website ''[[Phoronix]]'' found Linux-related references in a beta release of the Mac Steam client. This was followed later by the discovery of files for an incomplete [[Linux]] client available for download on Valve's own web servers.<ref>{{cite web
| url =http://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=steam_linux_script&num=1
